text: E jenumanja wankulupilile! Naga n’di mwalombile achakongwe wakulupilila, kaneka ni kwaleka ulombela nkanim’biche mwakwakwaya (gona ulombela), basi nganinkola jenumanja pa wanganyao eda (lilinda lya pakumala kwa ulombela) jilijose jatim’balanjile. Sano mwapani liwale, ni mwaleche kwaleka kwambone
